languages.text: "Значит, пойдете в бой с тем, что есть. А понадобится — умрете".
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
languages.original_text: "Значит, пойдете в бой с тем, что есть. А понадобится — умрете".

traits.locale_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
"Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

languages.text: « Vous devrez donc vous contenter de ce que vous avez pour vous battre. Et si les circonstances l'exigent, alors vous devrez mourir. »
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devrez donc vous contenter de ce que vous avez pour vous battre. Et si les circonstances l'exigent, alors vous devrez mourir. »

languages.text: «Entonces tendrá que usar los medios de los que disponga para luchar. Y morir, si es necesario».
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces tendrá que usar los medios de los que disponga para luchar. Y morir, si es necesario».

languages.text: “既然如此，你们用尽一切手段来战斗吧。如果情况需要，英勇献身吧。”
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，你们用尽一切手段来战斗吧。如果情况需要，英勇献身吧。”

languages.text: 「では、戦う手段を見つけよう。あなたに必須だ」
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

traits.locale_text: 「では、戦う手段を見つけよう。あなたに必須だ」

languages.text: "Dann werdet Ihr die Euch zur Verfügung stehenden Mittel nutzen, um zu kämpfen. Und Ihr werdet sterben, wenn es nötig ist."
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werdet Ihr die Euch zur Verfügung stehenden Mittel nutzen, um zu kämpfen. Und Ihr werdet sterben, wenn es nötig ist."

languages.text: "Öyleyse elinizdeki imkânları kullanarak savaşacaksınız, gerekiyorsa da öleceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Then you will use the means you have to fight. And die, if it is required of you."
